## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5593904da4697f6d80bea8f6926ba9668d25c9ba34ba801115e347ffc19c719c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'poc-lelouch' @ 1.6.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
